actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitations on the maximum amount of the deduction of interest on education loans.
short_title: Student Loan Interest Full Deductibility Act

summary.text: Student Loan Interest Full Deductibility Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the current dollar limitations on the tax deduction of interest on education loans.

titles.title: Student Loan Interest Full Deductibility Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitations on the maximum amount of the deduction of interest on education loans.
